testcase.name: Argos home page functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on argos home page............................................passed When user is search nike product............................................passed Then user should able to see all nike related products......................passed

testcase.name: argos relevance option functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on argos home page............................................passed When user is search nike product............................................passed And user select the product by relevance high to low price range............passed Then user should able to see all high to low price range product............passed

testcase.name: argos list of nike products select out of one product
testcase.system-out: Given user is on argos home page............................................passed When user is search nike product............................................passed And user select one product out of nike list of products....................passed Then user able to add selected product in basket............................passed
